section.name: Research contamination step
section.p: This step research contamination in samples fastq files. To do this Aozan uses the principles from FastqScreen. FastQ Screen allows you to screen a library of sequences in FastQ format against a set of sequence databases.
The code has been rewriting in Aozan and additionnal values have been created. A step is added for screen reads on the genome of the sample if the casava design file contains this data.
The next table contains the parameters of this step. For more details on mapping, you can see this page.

tr.td: Path to the file which make the corresponding between genome name in casava design file and the genome name reference used for identified index of bowtie mapper.

Path to the genomes descriptions repository. The genome description file contains some basic informations about the genome like the chromosome length. The repository allow to avoid useless genome sequence parsing once it has been already parsed in a previous run.
Path to the genomes indexes repository.
List of reference genomes used per default for fastqscreen (e.g. phix, adapters)

section.p: If none tests is at 'True', Fastq Screen will not been launched.

tr.td: Enable mapped except genome sample test
Enable mapped test for each reference genome test
Enable created a column with link to report fastqscreen file.
